text: Eurytoma is a genus of chalcid wasps in the family Eurytomidae. There are at least 620 described species in Eurytoma. File:Eurytoma gigantea.jpg|E. gigantea larva File:Eurytoma male.jpg|Eurytoma sp. adult male File:Eurytoma gigantea female.jpg|E. gigantea, adult female ==See also== * List of Eurytoma species ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Parasitic wasps Category:Eurytomidae
title: Eurytoma
